event.title: October Meeting of the Berlin Fellowship Group (online)

body.p: On Thursday, 28.10. our edu-meeting will take place. Everybody is invited to join us at 07:30 pm (CEST)in the conference room and discuss "Free Software and Education" with us, share experiences and work to liberate knowledge and education in Berlin and beyond. The topic for the upcoming meeting is "music". The developer of the Free Software Jamulus, David Kastrup, will present the project, which allows to bridge spatial at the speed of light and without the annoying delays as known from other conference platforms. After a demonstration, we are already looking forward to an enjoyable pleasant end of the evening. All Free Software enthusiasts are welcome and no registration is necessary to attend. Please feel free to share the announcement on the known platforms and follow us on Friendica to get the latest information about our events and activities.
